publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-966.1 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Learning Disability Review-As an amendment to motion (S1M-966) in the name of Iain Gray, leave out from "and" to end and insert "recognises the difficulties faced by local authorities as a result of underfunding; calls upon the Scottish Executive to press for a review of the social security and benefits systems to provide greater support to those with learning disabilities and welcomes the opportunity for inter-agency co-operation to ensure that those with learning disabilities are treated with equality and respect." Supported by: Kay Ullrich*
